verbs.description: [V: suv] [ARGM-DIR: jumps] [ARG1: upper east side curb] hits and kills 84-year - old woman upper east side manhattan — an suv jumped a curb striking and killing an 84-year - old woman before slamming into a scaffolding on the upper east side the nypd said friday the incident happened near the intersection of east 79th street and madison avenue shortly after 3 30 p m fdny manhattan upper east side
